p: In order to obtain a solution of the A. dealbata allelochemicals at natural concentrations Aguilera et al. [ 72] factored in amount of precipitations and naturally accumulated litter in Chile under conditions similar to the Mediterranean climate. The obtained aqueous extracts of various parts of A. dealbata showed a significant inhibition of growth, but not germinating capacity of Lactuca sativa L. Since all parts of the plant induced inhibition, A. dealbata is capable of showing allelopathic properties during the entire phenological cycle.
